function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;

var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

Outdoor Faucet Covers for Winter, 2 PCS 6″Wx 9″H Reusable Outside Faucet Insulated Cover Socks, Freeze Protection Garden Hose Cover Socks for Wall Taps Outside
【High Compatibility】 Faucet cover measures 9in x 6in, 2.3 inch thick. It is about 1-2 inch larger and 1inch thicker than most of other faucet socks. Works well with various faucet types, such as garden spigots, hose bibs, water tap, keep faucets protected in freezing weather.
【Quick & Easy Installtion 】 The faucet socks with Velcro straps are easy to put on and take off even you wear gloves in cold winter. Simply pull the cover over the faucet/tap and fasten it tightly with the Velcro strap. A few seconds is all it takes!
【Superior Protection】 Very thick faucet cover design. In winter protecting your outside faucets from freezing and bursting. In summer prevent faucets from the blazing sun or the rust. Help save costly repairs. It has the functions of antifreeze, rainproof, snowproof, sun exposure, windproof and dust prevention.
【Super Waterproof & Insulation】The water faucet cover for winter is constructed of 3 layers – 210D oxford cloth waterproof coating thicker insulated silk cotton 190t taffeta waterproof coating, making it durable and reusable season after season. effectively keep the faucet dry and warm during.
【Please Confirm Again】You will receive 2 pack faucet protective covers. Please measure the size before purchase,If you don’t know the size of your faucet, you can try to buy. It works well with various faucet types. If you have any questions, please contact us in time. We will reply within 24 hours.

4.5

item.title: YaNovate Bird Bath Heater for Outdoors in Winter, 2022 Birdbath Deicer 70 Watts Pond De-icer Full-Covered Aluminum Water Heated Thermostatically Controlled with Auto Shut Off Function for Patio Yard
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) 【2022 70W Thermostatically Controlled Birdbath Water Heated】AC 120V 70W the outdoor bird bath de-icer thermostatically controlled to operate when necessarily, will automatically turn off at 118 °F and restart work at 68 °F. Heated bird bath prevents water from freezing due to 0-degree F or colder weather. Attract more birds ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $39.99 - $29.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:51:55 UTC – Details)



【2022 70W Thermostatically Controlled Birdbath Water Heated】AC 120V 70W the outdoor bird bath de-icer thermostatically controlled to operate when necessarily, will automatically turn off at 118 °F and restart work at 68 °F. Heated bird bath prevents water from freezing due to 0-degree F or colder weather. Attract more birds to your yard in winter！
【Heavy Duty Material & Automatic Start-stop Design】Bird bath heater aluminum base surface and full coverage aluminum liners, with highly heat conductive and durable for maximum usage to prevent rust. Built-in an additional thermostat sensor which working continuously in the circuit. When the heating base temperature exceeds 118°F (48°C) will Automatic Disconnect and the temperature drops to 68°F (20°C), the heating will automatically start to ensure safety. Provide better care for your birds.
【Waterproof Design & Safe for Bird】Built-in full-coverage partition layer and high-density aluminum shell double protection can better protect the heating wire, heavy-duty Pond De-icer can waterproof and rust to ensure the safety of birds. Built-in heating cord allows birds and squirrels won’t get hurt if they peck at the electric cord keeps curious birds safe. Allows birds to play in warm water in winter.
【Plug and Play】The birdbath heater has no spare parts to replace, simply plug into a power source and your birds or farm animals will enjoy the gentle warmth water within minutes; In order to prolong the service life of the product, please make sure the heated chicken water Deicer is full cover by water.
【Widely Application】This bird bath heaters can provide fresh flowing warm water for birds and small animals outdoors in winter. Attract more birds to your yard to drink and bathe, It will make you happy to look out during a beautiful snow storm and see a bird getting a drink or a moment of rest from the weather.

4.5

★Soft Material- Women’s long underwear set made of 92% ultra-soft polyester 8% spandex with fleece lined, super skin-touch fabric, keeps you warm and cozy in freezing cold climates or bad weather.
★Moisture Wicking- Thermal underwear for women can wick away sweat fast, dry quickly and insulating from extreme cold. You no longer have to worry about that sticky or clammy feeling as work out or lounge at home.
★Snug-fitting- Ladies thermal underwear won’t make you feel binding or heavy, pants and shirt fit snugly and don’t bunch up, can be as women thermal pajama set, also great additional base layer under your clothes to keep the chill away from your skin.

★Occasion- You will feel warm with this tops and bottoms while curling, hiking, biking, hunting, skiing and snowshoeingin very cold weather, also can be as womens loungewear sets or great gift for Thanksgiving , Christmas.

The short plush lining makes the kids running gloves feel soft and comfortable and preserves better heat and maximum warmth for you to against the chilly winter and cold wind.

Moreover, the logo is fixed on the side of the cap via dedicated sewing process. Delicate and smooth stitching thread without easily split sewing, making it more durable and ensuring maximum comfort

item.content:encoded:
Price: $17.99
(as of Nov 28,2022 23:31:24 UTC – Details)

Product Description

BE YOUR OWN QUEEN!

Comfortable and Soft Material: We use soft and comfortable materials, which are both breathable and comfortable. At the same time, these tights are more durable and not easy to pilling.

Classic style must-have: Our tights are versatile and fashionable, whether it is loose tops or dresses, skirts; they can also be worn under loose pants to keep you more warm!

Reinforce Toe

Reinforce toe design protect your toe and not easy tear. And fully wrapped soles will not slide.

Control Top & High Waist

Soft opaque tights with control top, stay up, not easy to fall down. High waist design protects the abdomen and makes you less susceptible to cold.

High Elasticity & Soft Material

The high elastic material tights can be stretched at will, not too tight or too loose, keeping a comfortable environment.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 10.24 x 6.93 x 1.69 inches; 6.74 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 21, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ LASETA
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0B4NJHQ6X

Imported
Machine Wash
2 pairs pack. S to XXL. Black or suntan.
Control top and high waist.
120 Denier super opaque pantyhose.
Occasion- Office and daily life. Machine washable and hang dry.
